segments.text: Pretty good . Say , where are you living this semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In No . 4 Dorm . I like dorm life . You will meet a lot of people and you don't have to cook . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am looking for an apartment . I prefer living off campus . I can study better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you will find a place . Listen , I'd better go . I am going to be late for class .
segments.speaker: S2
